ing: 2 tablespoons red pepper flakes, or to taste
1 pound catfish fillets, cut into 1 inch pieces
des: "Use fillets of your favorite white fish to make an easy soup. Use wild onions or baby onions in place of the green onions if you can find them. This is a spicy red soup, the heat all depends on you."
ins: In a large pot, combine the tomato puree, water and green onions. Season with red pepper flakes. Set over medium heat and bring to a boil. Add rice and cook until tender, about 30 minutes. Add fish and simmer for 20 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
